result.execSummary:
The defendant Robert J Orlinski was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. On one or more other charges, Robert J Orlinski was found not guilty. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Robert J Orlinski is presumed innocent of the not guilty charges.

  • Robert J Orlinski was found guilty of Violate/Harassment Restraining Order, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 813.125(7).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Pay costs, fees, assessments and surcharges while on Probation or to convert to a civil judgment.
Court stated this is NOT a DNA case.
NO contact with the victim Angela P.
Obey any and all outstanding harassment orders.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert J Orlinski

records.descr: Notice of court ordered financial obligations
Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Due to not following the Attorney fee payment plan agreement, specifically payment(s) were missed, the payment plan has been ended and the failure to pay action has been enforced.
Assessment for Attorney Fees in the amount of $2,450.00 entered as ordered by the court on 09/11/2017  to pay $25.00 monthly.  Final payment due by 12/01/2025. Failure to pay is a Civil Judgment.
Affidavit and order for payment of attorney fees and costs due from Milwaukee County signed. Filed by Attorney Daryl Laatsch SC  $2450.00
Affidavit and Order for Payment of Attorney Fees and Costs, signed and filed.
Request for payment of $17.00 witness fees for witness Angela P. processed and forwarded to the Treasurer's Office on check request x25484701 in court 1x on 04/17/17.
Witness fee request prepared for Angela P. was approved for 1 appearance on 04/17/17 by the DA'S Victim/Witness Services.
Witness fee request prepared for Justin P. was approved for 1 appearance on 04/17/17 by the DA'S Victim/Witness Services.
Witness fee request prepared for Justin P. will be forwarded to DAs Victim/Witness Services for approval and date confirmation.
Witness fee request prepared for Angela P. will be forwarded to DAs Victim/Witness Services for approval and date confirmation.
Invoice 3/30/17 forwarded to accounts payable in the amount of $1000 to Dr. Brooke Lundbohm for services on 10/17/16, 11/09/16. Copy in File

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court with attorney William Oscar Marquis.  James Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  CASE FILE NOT IN COURT.
Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.

The Court sentenced the defendant to serve 9 MONTHS at the House of Corrections with 3 days credit CONSECUTIVE to any other sentence.
Court imposed and stayed the sentence and placed the defendant on 1 YEAR probation.
Conditions of probation are:
- 30 days condition time in the House of Correction to be served forthwith
- obey any and all outstanding harassment orders
- no contact with the victim Angela P
- pay costs, fees, assessments and surcharges while on probation to convert to a civil judgment.

Court stated this is not a DNA case.

Exhibits received and inventoried this date.  
Box 702
mn
Jury List, received and filed.
Exhibit list, recieved and filed.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court with attorney Daryl W Laatsch.  Randy Sitzberger on behalf of James Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
At the hour of 1:49pm the jury returned and, by their foreperson, brought in a verdict of NOT GUILTY AS TO COUNT 1 and GUILTY AS TO COUNT 2 which was then read.  Court polled and discharged the jury.  Verdict received and filed.  Court granted state's motion for judgment on the verdict as to count 2 and granted defense motion for judgment not withstanding the verdict as to count 1.  Court ordered entry of judgment of conviction.

Case adjourned for Sentencing Hearing on June 14, 2017 at 8:30am, Branch 47.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court with attorney Daryl W Laatsch.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
In Court discussion held on the record. 
Court finds that Defendant voluntarily, knowingly, and intelligently exerts his right to testify. 
Jury in the box at 9:37am. State rests. 
Sworn for the Defense: Robert O. 
Sidebar held. In chambers discussion held on the record. 
Defense rests. Testimony closed. Jury out of the box at 10:52am. 
In Court discussion as to jury instructions. 
Jury in the box at 11:14am. 
Court instructed jury.  Closing arguments by state and defense.  Court charged the jury.  Alternate juror selected by lot and released.  Jury retired at the hour of 12:11 to deliberate in the charge of Sheriff's Deputies D. Whitfield and D. Rutter who were duly sworn for that purpose.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court with attorney Daryl W Laatsch.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Pretrial discussions regarding jury instructions placed on the record.

Court ordered case adjourned until 1:30 p.m.

Pretrial discussions regarding witness testimony placed on the record.

Jury panel in court.  Voir dire proceeded at the hour of 2:10.  

Court instructed jury.  

Thirteen (13) good and lawful citizens of the County of Milwaukee, WI qualified to serve as jurors in the above entitled cause were duly impanelled and sworn.  

Jury list received and filed.  

Jury out of box at the hour of 3:05.

Jury in box at the hour of 3:20.

Court ordered witnesses sequestered. 

Opening statements by state and defense.  

Trial proceeded.  

Sworn for the state: Angela Perkins. 

Exhibits 1 -3 received.

Jury excused at the hour of 4:15 and ordered to return on 4/18/2017 at 9:15 a.m.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court with attorney Daryl W Laatsch.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for jury trial. Court grants state's request to adjourn the jury trial. Court ordered case adjourned for jury trial in Branch 47.  Jury trial scheduled for April 17, 2017 at 08:30 am.
Doctors Report dated 11/9/2016, received and filed.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court with attorney Daryl W Laatsch.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for return on doctors report. Defense counsel withdraws the NGI plea and requests a jury trial date. Court ordered case adjourned for jury trial in Branch 47.  Jury trial scheduled for January 23, 2017 at 08:30 am.

The Court was contacted by the Forensic unit. The Defendant contacted them and would like to proceed with the NGI exam. The Defendant is to have NGI exam on 10/17/2016. The Court contacted the State and defense. The Jury trial scheduled for 11/09/2016 at 08:30 am is VACATED. Case calendared for return on doctors report on 11/09/2016 at 08:30 am, Branch 47. LNR

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court with attorney Daryl W Laatsch.  Tyrone Martin St. Junior appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for return of doctors report. Defendant did not attend the examination. Defense requests a jury trial date. Court ordered case adjourned for jury trial in Branch 47.  Jury trial scheduled for November 9, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Order for Examination, signed and filed.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court with attorney Daryl W Laatsch.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for jury trial, however defense requests NGI evaluation.  Order for Examination, signed and filed.   NGI evaluation will take place the Wisconsin Forensic Unit, Room 504 of the Safety Building with Dr. Lundbohm on September 23, 2016 at 11:30. Case remains calendared in Branch 47.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for September 27, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Letter from Attorney Daryl W. Laatsch, received and filed.
Court ordered case adjourned for jury trial in Branch 47

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court with attorney Daryl W Laatsch.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 

Court makes a finding that defendant is indigent.  Court appoints Daryl Laatsch as counsel for defendant.  Attorney  Daryl Laatsch accepts appointment.  Order signed and filed. Court has not made determination as to reimbursment at this time.  Jury trial scheduled for August 24, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Attorney fees of $284.00 to be paid by 12/01/2016, failure to pay is a civil judgment.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant has made contact atty. Daryl Laatsch. Atty Laatsch will accept an appointment by the Court.   Court ordered case adjourned for jury trial in Branch 47  Status conference scheduled for May 24, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for August 15, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 47  Status conference scheduled for May 6, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court with attorney William O. Marquis.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  Attorney Marquis motion to withdraw as counsel heard and granted.    Court ordered case adjourned for status of counsel in Branch 47.  Status conference scheduled for May 5, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Appointing Attorney at County Expense, signed and filed

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court with attorney Christopher John Ertl.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  Attorney Ertl's request to withdraw as counsel heard and granted.  Attorney Wiiliam Marquis is in court on a separate matter and agrees to accept the case under the same conditions as the court's order of 5/12/2016.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 47.  Status conference scheduled for April 6, 2016 at 08:30 am.
State filed motion in limine;witness list and proposed jury instructions.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court with attorney Christopher John Ertl.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense counsel present and requested new final pretrial date to discuss with defendant.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court. James Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court re-appoints Christopher Ertl  as counsel for defendant at county expense.  Defendant not required to reimburse Milwaukee County for attorney fees. Court appoints counsel at the rate of $60.00 per hour.  Case passed.  Final pre-trial scheduled for March 3, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court with attorney Christopher John Ertl as stand by counsel.     Tyrone Martin St. Junior appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court ordered case adjourned for final pretrial on 2-22-16 at 8;30 and jury trial in Branch 47  Final pre-trial scheduled for February 22, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for April 6, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Assessment for Attorney Fees in the amount of $954.00 entered as ordered by the court on 09/29/15 to pay $60.00 monthly.  Final payment due by 02/28/17. Failure to pay is a Civil Judgment.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant advised of right to counsel.  Court examined defendant as to his waiver of counsel.  Court finds defendant freely and voluntarily waives his right to counsel. Defense orally request for discovery from the state is granted by the court. Court ordered as a nonmonetary condition of bail : defendant to read a book on trial advocacy and observe a jury trial.  Status conference scheduled for November 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Letter and documentation regarding Affidavit and Order for Payment of Attorney Fees and Costs submitted by the defense received and filed.  Paperwork given to the Judge for review.
Court ordered case adjourned for status on counsel     in Branch 47. LR  Status conference scheduled for 09-28-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court with attorney Christopher John Ertl.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw granted by the Court.
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt: Written No Contact Order signed and filed.  Defendant to have no contact with Justin and Angela P. .  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 09-08-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court with attorney Christopher John Ertl.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense motion to dismiss the complaint   proceeded.. NO testimony. Cause argued. Court Denied the motion.
State's reply to defendant's motion to dismiss received and filed. lr
Defense filed notice of motion and motion to dismiss complaint-lack of probable cause. lr

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court with attorney Christopher John Ertl.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for motion hearing in Branch 47. All motions to be filed in court within 30 days of today.  Motion hearing scheduled for 08-11-2015 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 47. lr  Status conference scheduled for 06-04-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
       Court appointed Attorney Ertl as counsel of record.  Written order received and filed. Court appointed at the rate of $60.00 per hour and the defendant does not have to reimburse the county at the conclusion of this case.
Defendant called the court and requested a plea date.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court with attorney Richard E. Thomey APPEARED AS A FRIEND OF THE COURT.   Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant does not qualify for public defender and wishes to retain private counsel. 
  Court ordered case adjourned for status ON COUNSEL  in Branch 47. LR  Status conference scheduled for 06-10-2015 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered case adjourned for status on counsel  in Branch 47. lr  Status conference scheduled for 04-06-2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court refuses to accept waiver of counsel, due to mental health status. Court referred defendant to PD's office forthwith.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Court ordered the Defendant to ABSOLUTELY not to have any contact with AP.

Defendant Robert J Orlinski in court.  Benjamin Andrew Wesson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.  Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant was given a referral to the Public Defender's Office. Defendant MAY be Public Defender eligible.  Defendant states he does not want public defender representation. The case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Br. 47.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 11, 2015 at 08:30 am.
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 2/20/15 @ 1:30 pm
